channel.description:
I am struggling with following the instructions in https[://]www[.]whonix[.]org/wiki/Qubes/Install I have downloaded gw and ws-16 and got stuck at: Configure `sys-whonix` and `anon-whonix` safely. [[9]][[10]][[11]][[12]][[13]] [[10]] points to https[://]github[.]com/QubesOS/qubes-mgmt-salt-dom0-virtual-machines/blob/master/qvm/sys-whonix.sls which in my understanding is a script, not reproduced here for brevity.
The script includes a comment: # Execute: # qubesctl state.sls qvm.sys-whonix dom0 which is similar with the next line in the instructions at https[:/]/www[.]whonix[.]org/wiki/Qubes/Install
Question: what to do with the script indicated by footnote [[10]], found at https[://]github[.]com/QubesOS/qubes-mgmt-salt-dom0-virtual-machines/blob/master/qvm/sys-whonix.sls How/where to run the script? In dom0? Should this be renamed as state.sls to make it consistent with the execute comment?
Any other thoughts are appreciated
